A Guide To Surviving Big Data and Psychological Science Joshua Hew and Jana Tomastikova 2024-08-19 Chapter 1 Introduction 1.1 How to use this guide 1.2 General strategies for the course This course is hard so prepare to kiss your first class honours goodbye. 1.3 How to search for stuff you don’t understand Learn how to read documentation for libraries/functions, most can be found on CRAN. Most packages have a tutorial or readme document that explains how and when to use them. (search for them!) Chatgpt can help with code but using it means you won’t actually understand the code. Better to just follow a tutorial and implement it yourself. 1.4 About us
